# Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api library(plotly) trace1 <- list( x = c(1, 2, 3, 4), y = c(10, 15, 13, 17), type = "scatter" ) trace2 <- list( x = c(1, 2, 3, 4), y = c(16, 5, 11, 9), type = "scatter" ) data <- list(trace1, trace2) response <- py$plotly(data, kwargs=list(filename="basic-line", fileopt="overwrite")) url <- response$url
